snippet.title: Let Them Come: Onslaught - Official Trailer | The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description: Stranded on an alien world, overrun by horrors, and with only one way out — nuke it from orbit! Every battle is a desperate last stand, combining bullet hell chaos, deep progression, and brutal sci-fi horror with an ‘80s VHS aesthetic. Watch the latest Let Them Come: Onslaught trailer for this action roguelike/survivors-like to see gameplay and hordes of enemies you'll face. Let Them Come: Onslaught will be available on PC (via GOG, Epic Games Store, and Steam), Luna, PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch.
